## TGl1ComponentRenderer type

Webgl1 renderer, without extensions by default.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type TGl1ComponentRenderer<TExts extends TGlExtensionKeys> = TGlComponentRenderer<WebGLRenderingContext, TExts>;
```
